attributes.action: halt plans for an elected House of Lords, keeping the current appointment system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To have an elected House of Lords would simply add another layer of bureaucracy to the political system.  As voting turnout has decreased to serious levels, another set of elections is not going to improve the current apathy throughout the UK.  The brilliance of our upper chamber is the wealth of knowledge and expertise that it currently holds.  The majority have spent a near lifetime in politics and are thus able to see the wider picture, than would the regular man from the street.  We must protect this traditional aspect of our political lives for the good of all.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "halt plans for an elected House of Lords, keeping the current appointment system."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
